About Me:

Hi! I am a senior at Franklin W. Olin College of Engineering studying Computer Engineering with a concentration in Innovative Education. My my career goal is to use technology to make project based and hands-on learning accessible to a broader range of people. This is derived from a lifelong interest in education and technolgy.


Featured Projects:

Mobile App for Kids to Learn a Key Step in the Design Process

Hands On Learning For Underserved Kids in India

Independent Study and Consulting work in Belgium for KU Leuven and Thomas Moore

S2 - User Centered Design project on Volunteer Physicians

Robotic Player Guitar
